name: Ozak AI
description: Ozak AI is an agentic AI platform that uses predictive AI to deliver real-time financial intelligence by combining machine learning models with decentralised infrastructure. It enables users - ranging from individual investors to institutions - to receive market forecasts, risk assessments, and data-driven insights. By integrating with Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePIN), Ozak ensures secure and scalable data processing. The platform also allows customization through Prediction Agents that monitor selected financial signals and provide tailored alerts.
